server.dbLogic

Class SaleDBLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.dbLogic.SaleDBLogic

  • public class SaleDBLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible on send querys to the DB and get/insert/update/delete Data from the data base and send it back to the server controller with the answer about the request that has been sent.
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    MyFuel Team

      this function send query to the DB and get all of the sale templates in the table

      void updateRunningSale(java.lang.String saleName, int isRunning)
      this function get sale name and number 0/1 if its running or not, and update the status of it (running or not) by sending appropriate query to the DB
